info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 3:12AM CDT until August 12 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Montgomery County in south central Illinois... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 312 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Carlinville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Litchfield, Hillsboro, Nokomis, Raymond, Witt, Taylor Springs, Coffeen, Schram City, Van Burensburg, Irving, Fillmore, Coalton, Waggoner, Harvel, Butler, Ohlman, Wenonah, Chapman, and Honey Bend. This includes Interstate 55 in Illinois between exits 52 and 63. This also includes Lake Lou Yaeger. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
